jobTitle: Director of Sales - SLED - Remote | WFH
description:
Location: San Francisco, Washington DC, Raleigh, Philadelphia, Seattle, Portland, New York City, Los Angeles, Denver, Boston, Atlanta, Austin

Position: Full-time / Remote

About The Role

We are looking for a dynamic leader to build and lead our SLED (State, Local, and Education) Go-To-Market (GTM) team from the ground up. In this role, you'll have the exciting opportunity to drive our success in the Public Sector and tap into a vast market potential.

Key Responsibilities

Drive revenue performance and manage Senior Management reporting for the SLED team.

Recruit, lead, and retain a high-performing sales team.

Develop and execute a growth strategy for SLED accounts.

Create and implement an effective GTM strategy for the SLED sector.

What You Bring To The Table

10+ years of experience in tech sales, with at least 5 years in sales management.

Proven track record of selling enterprise solutions to U.S. SLED accounts.

Established relationships in the territory.

Experience interacting with customers, partners, and key stakeholders.

Knowledge of SLED contracting and procurement processes and experience with VARs (e.g., Carahsoft, SHI, CDW).

Ability to generate demand in a new technology category.

What Makes Us Unique

Inclusive Culture: We are committed to building a diverse and inclusive workplace that reflects the global community we serve. We celebrate each team member's unique experiences and perspectives.

Flexible Work Arrangements: Enjoy remote or hybrid work options and flexible hours to balance your professional and personal life.

Supportive Environment: We focus on what makes each of us unique and foster a community-oriented culture.

Professional Development: Take advantage of continuous learning opportunities and career development through our career compass program.

Comprehensive Benefits: We offer robust healthcare coverage, a 401(k) plan with company matching (up to $5,000), and a generous vacation policy to support a healthy work-life balance.

Compensation

The starting base salary for this role ranges from $150,000 to $185,000. Actual base pay will be determined based on factors such as experience, skills, business needs, and market conditions. In addition to the base salary, this role may be eligible for bonuses, benefits, and equity as part of our competitive total rewards package.

Equal Opportunity

We are an equal opportunity employer and welcome applications from all individuals regardless of gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, race, age, national origin, citizenship status, religion, disability, or any other characteristic.

Note To Recruitment Agencies

We do not accept unsolicited agency resumes. Please do not forward resumes to our employees or any company location. We are not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes and will not pay fees to third-party agencies that do not have a signed agreement for this specific role.

Employment Type: Full-Time

Drive revenue performance and manage Senior Management reporting for the SLED team.

Recruit, lead, and retain a high-performing sales team.
